section.title: Introduction to &name-web;
section.para: This introduction takes you on a short tour showing some aspects of &name-web;. It is not complete so there will be things which aren't covered. We're working on this.

Due to constant development some things change over time resulting in different appearance and additional options. So far we offer three small introductions, one for the current version 1.5, one for version 1.3.x/1.4.x, and one for &name-web; up to version 1.2.x.
